pageContext.collection_description: Contains materials relating to White's production and writing career, including scripts for The Victor Borge Show, Fibber McGee and Molly which were written by Don Quinn and Phil Leslie (script summaries for 1935-1946 are also included) and The Great Gildersleeve, 1935-1947. Also includes sound recordings of programs broadcast over KVOA, 1941-1944.
